Detailed Description

template<class SICK_MONITOR_CLASS, class SICK_MSG_CLASS>
class SickToolbox::SickLIDAR< SICK_MONITOR_CLASS, SICK_MSG_CLASS >

Provides an abstract parent for all Sick LIDAR devices.
